original_text: Under their command was an army of 307,500, who could make war with mighty power, to help the king against the enemy.
korean_text: 그의 휘하의 군대가 삼십만 칠천오백 명이라 건장하고 싸움에 능하여 왕을 도와 적을 치는 자이며

sentences.original_text: Under their command was an army of 307,500
who could make war with mighty power
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 강력한 힘으로 전쟁할 수 있었고

sentences.original_text: to help the king against the enemy.
